Expression Blend 3 SDK
=====================================================
The following list is a list of files available with Microsoft Expression Blend 3 SDK for redistribution under the Expression Blend 3 SDK license.  If the Microsoft software you have licensed is not Expression Blend 3 SDK, only the files that are installed by the Microsoft software may be redistributed under such license.

Subject to the license terms for the software, you may redistribute the .dll files listed below unmodified as a part of your programs.

_____________________________________________________________


Behaviors Runtime Components (WPF)
---------------------------------------------
Microsoft.Expression.Interactions.dll
System.Windows.Interactivity.dll


Behaviors Runtime Components (Silverlight)
---------------------------------------------
Microsoft.Expression.Interactions.dll
System.Windows.Interactivity.dll


Build Tasks:
---------------------------------------------
All files under:

	{Program Files}\MSBuild\Microsoft\Expression\Blend\3.0\
